snippet: Witches of Bushwick is a social and creative group more in tune with Stevie Nicks than Elvira.
abstract: Witches of Bushwick is social and creative group in Brooklyn, NY, comprised of young neighborhood women, more in tune with Stevie Nicks than Elvira; group, which has co-opted some of more accessible ideas of witchcraft, such as female bonding, creative enrichment, and being in touch with spiritual realm, gathers for monthly parties that draw crowds of nearly 200, with Facebook and Instagram followers in the thousands.
lead_paragraph: Witches of Bushwick is a social and creative group more in tune with Stevie Nicks than Elvira.

headline.seo: Witches of Bushwick Is a Social and Creative Group in Brooklyn
headline.main: The Only Witches’ Brew Here Is the Beer
headline.print_headline: The Only Witches’ Brew Here Is the Beer
